Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Interface LogConfig.ChangePublisher

Enclosing interface:
LogConfig
public static interface LogConfig.ChangePublisher
Config Change Publisher. By default this is enabled with "logging.global.change" set to true and then configuring which "logger" prefix will be allowed to change with "logging.change" + "." + logger name set to a list of LogConfig.ChangePublisher.ChangeType or true/false to enable or disable all changes.
